snippet: The announcement by the basketball star Brittney Griner that she is a lesbian has altered an awkward relationship between Baylor University and its gay students.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column on announcement by Baptist-affiliated Baylor University women's basketball player Brittney Griner that she is lesbian; notes admission has altered awkward, if not contentious, relationship between university and its gay students.
lead_paragraph: The announcement by the basketball star Brittney Griner that she is a lesbian has altered an awkward relationship between Baylor University and its gay students.

headline.print_headline: ‘Griner Effect’ May Change the Game at Baylor
headline.seo: Could Griner’s Announcement That She’s Lesbian Be a Game Changer at Baylor?
headline.main: ‘Griner Effect’ May Change the Game at Baylor
